current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit the Internal Revenue Service from modifying the standard for determining whether an
			 organization is operated exclusively for the promotion of social welfare
			 for purposes of

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action-desc.#text: Read the second time and placed on the calendar

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives February 26, 2014.

action-desc.#text: Read the second time and placed on the calendar

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Stop Targeting of Political Beliefs by the IRS Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Stop Targeting of Political Beliefs by the IRS Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Applicable standard for determinations of whether an organization is operated exclusively for the
			 promotion of social welfare

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply for purposes of determining the status of
			 organizations under

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: after the date of the enactment of this Act.

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

text.#text:
The standard and definitions as in effect on January 1, 2010, which are used to determine whether
			 an organization is operated exclusively for the promotion of social
			 welfare for purposes of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not (nor may any delegate of such Secretary) issue, revise, or
			 finalize any regulation (including the proposed regulations published at
			 78 Fed. Reg. 71535 (November 29, 2013)), revenue ruling, or other guidance
			 not limited to a particular taxpayer relating to the standard and
			 definitions specified in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Stop Targeting of Political Beliefs by the IRS Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, this section shall apply with respect to any organization
			 claiming tax exempt status under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Stop Targeting of Political Beliefs by the IRS Act of 2014/s:2/ss:d

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
which was created on, before, or after the date of the
			 enactment of this Act.

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

text.#text:
This section shall not apply after the one-year period beginning on the date of the enactment of
			 this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3865 PCS: Stop Targeting of Political Beliefs by the IRS Act of 2014
